title: "Why Ethical AI Won't Catch On Anytime Soon"
excerpt: "While there has been a good deal of discussion about the use of AI in enterprises and the possibility of building ethical AI strategies, new research indicates that even 10 years from today, it is unlikely that ethical AI design will be widely adopted."
